verses.roman:
mahā-viṣṇura niśvāsera nāhika paryanta
eka manvantarāvatārera dekha lekhāra anta

synonyms: mahā-viṣṇura—of Lord Mahā-Viṣṇu; niśvāsera—of the exhalations; nāhika paryanta—there is no limit; eka manvantara-avatārera—of only one feature of the Lord, namely the manvantara-avatāra; dekha—just see; lekhāra anta—it is beyond the power of writing.
translation: "There is no limit to the exhalations of Mahā-Viṣṇu. Just see how impossible it is to speak or write of even only the manvantara-avatāra.
